entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:24 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
